2073690.name: REmatch Demo
2073690.description: REmatch is an RPG game with a spooky, puzzle based, combat system. You got stuck in this unknown city, but you have to face all the challenging events to go home. Use your chess tactics to make decisions and fight whoever gets in your way. You are not the best, you are not the worst, you are a chess champion who creates solutions for all. Grab weapons, solve puzzles, explore and overcome the darkness.
